english_example_sentence: If you lead successfully in this project, everyone will be happy.
russian_example_sentence: Если вы успешно возглавите этот проект, все будут счастливы.
turkish_example_sentence: Siz bu projede başarılı öncülük etseniz, herkes mutlu olur.
